original_text:
“Yet how often is the lamp of the wicked snuffed out?
    How often does calamity come upon them,
    the fate God allots in his anger?
korean_text: 악인의 등불이 꺼짐과 재앙이 그들에게 닥침과 하나님이 진노하사 그들을 곤고하게 하심이 몇 번인가

sentences.original_text: Yet how often is the lamp of the wicked snuffed out?
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 악인의 등불이 얼마나 자주 꺼지는가?

sentences.original_text: How often does calamity come upon them
the fate God allots in his anger?
